item.title: Branches preventing access for pedestrians on footpath, branches entwined with telephone cable, branches breaking off and hitting the car on our drive. Tree branches look diseased., 24th July
item.description:
Near the layby directly outside 86 Tobyfield Road, Bishops Cleeve. Reported to Tewkesbury Council who advised it was Gloucestershire County councils problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86,88, Tobyfield Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lane marking, 24th July
item.description:
On leaving Arle Court roundabout to join Hatherley Lane, there is no definitive lane marking to continue onto Grovefield Way. The left hand lane says left or straight on, is straight on into the B&Q carpark? I have used this lane many a time to access Grovefield Way, whilst correctly indicating, and have had several instances of being horn blasted and even shouted at by somebody trying the same from the right hand lane, which has no markings. Which is the correct lane ? and can it be marked please. Regards, Jonathan Sherry
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Tree Overhanging Property and branches fallen on car, 24th July
item.description:
Tree is overhanging private property, causing a loss of light and branches fallen onto car parked on private driveway. About three weeks ago council contractors cut the trees shorter branches that were fine and ignored the overhanging larger branches higher up. They left dead wood and within a week of them leaving we have large branches falling onto the footpath, road and a private driveway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 24th July
item.description:
A tree branch has been knocked by a large sided vehicle and the branch is now broken and remains in the canopy. Please can this be looked at.
Report on FixMyStreet
